name: Hectic Mediocre Office: Xtreme!
description:
This game is about being mediocre.

Run around the office frantically doing tasks, like mashing your keyboard to type, calling people and catching falling documents!

Don't get the highest score or you'll lose!

Don't get the lowest score or you'll lose!

(game has bugs but the WOWIEJAM3 that it's been made for is closing in 20 mins so I can't fix them in time!)

(my first gamejam, made in under 24 hours)
